NOOOOOO!!!!
Fuck, I just wanted them together. This literally made me cry, 9/10 because of the sad end...

Yo this is sick. It remind me of another beautiful story based doujin on this site called Night of Flight.” Anyways, as beautifully sad as the story is, the action is left kinda lacking. In terms of porn, this is a 5.5/10 for me.
I come here to fap, not to feel. Great doujin anw
Man.. it was very disappointing. Btw people need to close their eyes when kissing cuz only psychopath do that

Well it's not too disappointing if you think about it we never considered true feelings of such said individuals and in fact are almost always presented with 2 character with both good and bad endings but this one here goes more deep into ordinary lives like for instance one might have medical or psychic conditions holding oneself back and many other reasons like depression or accidental or prepanned deaths or grudges of kinds as such all lives are complicated and there being literally Billions of us along with our 90 + year's ( if Lucky ) worth of live may shed some light on some things overall or they can just be a pleasant or sad memory from the past. It's an amazing takeoff over unsolved cases adding more to the unknown pleasant mysteries in life.
Disappointing ending. All that romantic buildup and nothing ever came. There wasn't even any sort of goodbye or anything.
Would’ve been about a million times better without prostitution and smoking
when she pulled out an uno reverse card

anyhow, just wanted to tell y’all that there’s a sequel, just not w the same characters. Nanako doesn’t appear in it but Maki does. It’s set in the same universe + it’s really sweet. If you can read Chinese, def go check it out rn
